post.file: #!/bin/sh kkos=`find /opt/blcr -name blcr_imports.ko | head -1` if test -n "$kkos"; then /bin/cp $kkos /lib/modules/`uname -r`/extra/ /sbin/depmod -a /sbin/modprobe blcr_imports fi kos=`find /opt/blcr -name blcr.ko | head -1` if test -n "$kos"; then /bin/cp $kos /lib/modules/`uname -r`/extra/ /sbin/depmod -a /sbin/modprobe blcr fi
